mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.code, a.enable, a.create_time, a.update_time FROM sys_role a
mapper.select: LEFT JOIN sys_role_user ur ON ur.role_id = a.id WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.enable = '1' AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time

WHERE a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND a.remarks like CONCAT('%', #{remarks}, '%')
ORDER BY a.create_date

SELECT count(sr.id) FROM `sys_role_user` ru,sys_role sr where ru.role_id=sr.id and sr.tenant_id=#{tenantId} and ru.user_id = #{userId} and sr.name='机构管理员' and ru.`enable` = true and sr.del_flag = false and sr.`enable` = true
select * from sys_tenant where parent_id = #{parentTenantId} and id = #{subTenantId} and `enable` = true and del_flag = false
select name,version_number,url from sys_tenant_module where tenant_id = #{tenantId} and `enable` = true and del_flag = false

select DISTINCT sm.`name`,sm.url,sm.id from sys_role_user ru, sys_role_permission rp, sys_module sm where ru.role_id = rp.role_id and rp.module_id = sm.id and ru.user_id = #{userId} and ru.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and ru.`enable` = true and rp.del_flag = false and rp.`enable` = true and sm.del_flag = false and sm.`enable` = true ORDER BY sm.id asc
